Author: amichail
Title: Every Demo 2007 startup ranked from 1 to 62

Author: pg
Content: To combat linkjacking, people with editor auth can replace linkjacked urls with the url of the original source.  The original submitter still gets the karma points though; he was after all the one who brought it to everyone's attention.

Author: pg
Content: I know of cases where cofounders met at startup school, but we haven't funded any.  The most ad hoc group of founders we funded were a pair who knew one another online but hadn't met. That didn't work out very well.

Title: Ten things you should not say to your VC.
